summary: Vienna is Austria's capital and biggest city, with over 2 million people. It's located in the east, near the Alps and the Danube River. Originally a Roman settlement, it became an important city in the Holy Roman Empire and later the Austrian Empire. Vienna is known for its music, with famous composers like Beethoven and Mozart. The city has beautiful architecture, including Baroque palaces. It's also home to many international organizations and is considered one of the most livable cities in the world.
title: Vienna
